nodes.text: A B1-Series battle droid was used by the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars, serving Poggle the Lesser.

Following the Second Battle of Geonosis, this unit, alongside O.M.5 and another battle droid escorted Lord Poggle's Armored Assault Tank with two winged Geonosian warriors. After losing a munitions crate, O.M.5 and the other battle droid began marching behind Poggle's tank. The group was caught up in a sandstorm, and this battle droid was not seen with them when O.M.5 succumbed to the sand and wind.
The B1 battle droid, like every battle droid in The Clone Wars movie and The Clone Wars TV series, was voiced by Matthew Wood. His name was never given.
